original_text: Those men did not have to give a report on how they used the money. People knew that they were honest men.
korean_text: 또 그 은을 받아 일꾼에게 주는 사람들과 회계하지 아니하였으니 이는 그들이 성실히 일을 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Those men did not have to give a report
on how they used the money
People knew that they were honest men
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그들이 정직한 사람들이라는 것을 알았습니다
